title: Dosukoi Sushi-Zumo
synopsis: Sushi have become sumo wrestlers!! Which SUSHI ingredient is the strongest of all!? Tamago-nosato, Otoro-yama, Salmon-zakura, Kurumaebi-zou, Ikura-maru……and so many more. Each unique sumo wrestler uses its ingredients to its advantage, unleashing a wide range of techniques. So, who will win today’s match!? Put some spirit into it! “Hakkeyoi Nokotta!”

title: Qian Qiu
synopsis: "Yan Wushi had walked a path full of blood and corpses. He did not believe in the good nature of humanity. Even more so, he did not believe that there could be someone with great kindness and sense of justice, who would be so considerate of others without asking anything in return. One day, Shen Qiao, who was the sect leader of Mount Xuandu, the number one Daoist sect under the heavens, was challenged to a duel but somehow fell off the cliff. Yan Wushi happened to pass by down there. Seeing Shen Qiao who was seriously injured to the point of dying, he suddenly came up with a perfect idea… After thousands of autumns, who could stay eternal?" (Source: Novel Updates)
background: Thousand Autumns (山河剑心, Qian Qiu) is a donghua based on a Chinese web novel of the same name, written by Meng Xi Shi (梦溪石)

title: With All Our Hearts
synopsis: Kanazawa College of Art is scheduled to move to a new campus in 2023. In December 2020, the short animation "With All Our Hearts" was completed with the aim of publicizing the new campus. This work was created by Hiromasa Yonebayashi, an animation director who studied at the College and also a visiting professor, collaborating with 20 students. It is an original story directed by Yonebayashi based on the images and ideas that the students had in mind. [from youtube description]

title: Soredemo Ayumu wa Yosetekuru
synopsis: On a whim, first-year Ayumu Tanaka quits the Kendo Club to join the illegitimate Shogi Club. Urushi Yaotome, the president of the club and a master of shogi, is thrilled to finally have a playing partner. As Ayumu's upperclassman, Urushi endeavors to be his shogi mentor and student role model. Too often, however, she finds herself blushing with embarrassment! Stone-faced and honest, Ayumu sees no issue with calling Urushi "cute." Although Ayumu likes her, he refrains from confessing and promises himself to first beat her in a game of shogi. Through school life and shogi games, the two students have many hilarious and heart-warming adventures. Ayumu enjoys every second with Urushi, but he is still a long way from beating her in shogi. With the commitment he made to himself, will Ayumu ever get the chance to confess his feelings to Urushi?

details.Synonyms: Even so, Ayumu draws closer to the endgame, Even So, Ayumu Approaches
details.Japanese: それでも歩は寄せてくる

title: BeyRaiderz: Shogun
synopsis: BeyWarriors: BeyRaiderz is a Canadian/Japanese anime series, a spin-off of the series Beyblade. While it has been produced in Japan, it has yet to be aired in Japanese. BeyRaiderz has been commissioned by Nelvana to act as a solo series consisting of 13-episodes. The series was originally announced as BeyRaiderz: Shogun, but has since been renamed BeyWarriors: BeyRaiderz. The series acts as a continuation to BeyWheelz as it continues to follow the story of Sho, Jin, and Leon.
background: In an unknown land, six guardian beasts provide protection and help cities to thrive through battles called BeyRaiderz. An unknown evil arises to take on the six guardian figures, forcing the six to unite. At the end of the battle the land is protected, but the guardians fall into a slumber. This allows many natural disasters to occur, causing the land to lose its beauty and the people to forget about BeyRaiderz battles. As the six guardian beasts begin to awaken, they call on six BeyWarriors from other lands. The six BeyWarriors are each given BeyRaiderz and charged with going from coliseum arena to coliseum arena to battle. Battling enough times will allow the spirits to reawaken, and it can't happen soon enough as the same darkness that caused them to unite is reawakening and threatens to destroy the world once more.

title: Le Bi Youyou
synopsis: In the kindergarten class of the future world, Lebi and the alien children attend classes and play games together. Although everyone looks different, they have their own characteristics. Xiao Lebi's hands-on ability is the first in the class. Xiao Lebi’s father is a spacecraft designer, and Lebi often brings wonderful ideas to his father. Xiao Lebi’s mother is a caring and wise veterinarian. She can not only treat small animals on the earth, but also cure the diseases of small alien animals. The alien bunny yoyo is one of the small animals cured by his mother, and it has become a close friend of Xiao Lebi. (translated from douban)

synopsis: In the kindergarten class of the future world, Lebi and the alien children attend classes and play games together. Although everyone looks different, they have their own characteristics. Xiao Lebi's hands-on ability is the first in the class. Xiao Lebi’s father is a spacecraft designer, and Lebi often brings wonderful ideas to his father. Xiao Lebi’s mother is a caring and wise veterinarian. She can not only treat small animals on the earth, but also cure the diseases of small alien animals. synopsis: Set in a world of cruelty and heartbreak, Fairy Ranmaru: Anata no Kokoro Otasuke Shimasu follows five young men who work at the mysterious "Bar F" and who offer to heal the hearts of their clients, wiping away their tears and causing smiles to bloom like flowers. They take no payment... aside from stealing their clients' hearts. (Source: Crunchyroll)

details.Japanese: Fairy蘭丸~あなたの心お助けします~

title: Le Bi Youyou Dayang Huan Youji
synopsis: "Lebi Yoyo Ocean Travels" tells the story of Lebi and Yoyo, two children, in order to complete the task of "collecting marine life illustrations" given to them by the inventor's father, with the help of the "question mark underwater travel assistant" invented by father Next, enter the story of traveling to the underwater world. During the journey, Lebi and Yoyo not only encountered various underwater creatures, but also had various interesting stories between them. Lebi Yoyo not only gained everyone’s friendship, but also solved the difficulties encountered. At the same time, he learned about these marine creatures, learned a variety of underwater knowledge, and experienced various underwater phenomena. growing up. This colorful underwater world can attract Lebiyouyou, and it can also attract children watching. Let's go on an underwater adventure together!(translated from youku)

title: Le Bi Youyou Xilie Zhi Dongwu Ziran
synopsis: Follow Lebi and Yoyo into nature and meet more cute animals! (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 乐比悠悠系列之动物自然

synopsis: Lebi and Yoyo live in a family of four. Their father is a great inventor who would play with them and solve various problems for them. Their mother pays great attention to exercise and health, and is full of love. They also have a mischievous, mischievous pet-small fish tank BOBO. In this lovely world, although sometimes noisy and noisy, Lebi and Yoyo have experienced various things and lived a very happy and joyful life. (translateed from tenceng)

title: Kuaile Xiao Zheng Xing
synopsis: It tells the daily life that the residents of Xiao Zhengxing love to hear, and the story of the struggle between the righteous heroes and the bad guys who secretly destroy the peace of the planet. (translated from tenceng)

title: Jiayou Baobei
synopsis: The arrival of the family of the unicorn beast Xiaorui has caused some wonderful things to happen to the animal tribes of the sea every day. Under the correct guidance of Xiaorui’s father, mother and kindergarten teachers, Xiaorui’s own magical powers have gradually come into play, making some small things in life vivid and... (translated from baidu)

title: Zhonghua Shangxia Wuqian Nian
synopsis: Animated cartoons introducing Chinese history, ranging from the opening of Pangu to the Qing Dynasty Emperor Kangxi and Qianlong, totaling 269 episodes. 　　 "Five Thousand Years of China" is a large-scale cartoon historical story invested and produced in April 1998. The film is novel in concept. With the participation of two young children in modern life-Mao Mao, Xiao Qi and a smart computer, according to historical documents, according to the order of the times, it leads to vivid and interesting historical pictures, reproducing the five thousand Chinese nation. Years of brilliant civilization. It can be said that "China Up and Down Five Thousand Years" is an excellent work introducing Chinese history to young people. Through animation, a form that children love to hear and see, it shows many meaningful events and many outstanding characters that have occurred in China's long history, so as to broaden their horizons, inspire their wisdom, and cultivate their national self-esteem and Patriotic passion. 　　 This film is a large-scale animation series that reproduces the five thousand years of Chinese history based on historical materials and in the order of changes in the times. The film has been broadcast on many TV stations. In the film, two young children in modern life--Maomao, Xiaoqi and a computer participate in bringing out vivid and interesting historical stories, one story by one episode. From the opening of Pangu to Wang Cong'er, the heroine of the late Qing Dynasty, all important historical events in the process of Chinese history, historical figures, such as the Great Yu governing the waters, lying salaries and tasting courage, adding yellow robe, smelling chickens and dancing... such as Hongmen banquet, seven-step poems, righteous songs, literary prison... such as Tao Yuanming, Zu Chongzhi, Princess Wencheng and Marco Polo... have everything, vivid and colorful. It is a condensed and accurate picture of Chinese history. The film is divided into ancient times-Qin and Han; Sui, Tang-Song dynasties; Yuan-Qing dynasties, with a total of 270 stories.(translated from douban)

title: Jigong
synopsis: Fighting wits and brave monks, promote the good and punish the wicked clap. He has great magical powers, he travels around the world, and he smiles at all beings. Use a broken fan as a weapon to punish the bullies who bully others, expose the hypocrisy of liars, fight against fairies, fight wits against bad guys, help justice, and act for the heavens. A pair of cold eyes sees through the world's scorching cold, and a pair of enthusiasm removes the injustice in the world. He is praised by others, laughed by others, scolded by others, and ridiculed by others. He is free and unhurried. He is also mad and vulgar. His story has been circulating for nearly a thousand years and is known to women and children. He is the most respected "living Buddha" in China. ". Who is he? This is the only one, the roll has no semicolon, and the monk Jigong does.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Jigong Chuanqi
synopsis: "Legend of Jigong": classic nostalgic animation in the 90s. 　　 Ji Gong, formerly known as Li Xiuyuan, was the head of the stone wall outside the small north gate of Chengguan, Tiantai. When he was young, he was influenced by Buddhism and Taoism, studied traditional culture of scripture and history, and was good at poems and words. After the death of his parents, he went to the Guoqing Temple, Lingyin Temple, and Jingci Temple to study Buddhism successively. They were given the title of Daoji, and they were nicknamed Jidian. People have known them as Jigong for thousands of years after passing away. This humorous comic creation original reference work is one of the most widely circulated classical gods, ghosts and monsters books in our country, "The Complete Biography of Jigong", a book that gathers heaven and earth, gods, ghosts, charms and Buddhism, plays the sorrows and joys of the world, and successfully creates a Jigong Living Buddha, a great humorous hero who saves the world and saves lives in folklore. Shenjie Comics Company has delicately and vividly portrayed this famous comedy character in history with colorful humor comics, and added a lot of modern humorous and funny comedy elements.(translated from douban)

title: Hun Yuan
synopsis: This film is the first domestic cartoon that reflects realistic themes. It mainly tells the story of several children playing football. In the production of this film, a computer coloring system was used for the first time, and a large number of post-digital synthesis was carried out. Compared with traditional animation production, the use of these new digital technologies greatly liberated the labor of manual coloring. Improve the production efficiency of the entire film. (translated from douban)

title: Kuaile Chengzhang
synopsis: Qiangqiang is a student in the lower grades of elementary school. He is civilized, polite and responsible. In school, he learned a lot of etiquette that should be paid attention to in group activities. Participating in national flag raising, graduation ceremonies, seminars, sports games, spring outings gave him a more meaningful sense of collective honor and enabled him to understand collective etiquette more deeply. The meaning represented. In family life, Qiangqiang pays attention to the communication etiquette between neighbors, considers and respects the elders, and is familiar with the hospitality under the guidance of his parents, which is praised by everyone. He realized that the beauty and harmony of society originate from our usual civilized behavior, from noble ideological qualities and moral cultivation, and he will continue to work hard for the bright future of the motherland. (translated from douban)

title: Yu Shouwang Zhe
synopsis: The first part: 　　 One early winter night at the end of the 20th century, countless strange cards suddenly fell from the hazy sky and spread all over the world. No one knows where they come from and what they do. A year later, a world-famous adventurer and archaeologist announced to the world that he mastered the spell that could turn cards into behemoths and could manipulate them to fight. With the emergence of Eudemons, the balance order of human society was broken. In order to change the chaos, the government organized a biennial World Beastmaster Competition. Select talented people to maintain world peace. One of the protagonists of the story, Qi Xiang, is very envious of the profession of the beast master. By chance, he got a monster momo, and then he and his friends Xuanfu, Xiru, and Hua Punt, who are friends and enemies, began their journey to realize their dreams. After a series of competitions, they have overcome all kinds of difficulties and approached their dreams step by step. But at this time, the terrifying dark forces are quietly approaching them. Reach out... 　　 Part 2: 　　 This is a world where the whole world is crazy and obsessed with card battles. In this world, governance and protection of the environment are regarded as the most sacred authority. Under the leadership of the 7th generation patriarch Yuwen Jinchen, the Yuwen clan of the card family who has been famous for more than 200 years, won the unprecedented three consecutive championships in the national competition, making the Yuwen clan once again regained the environment after being suppressed by the Changle Club for more than 100 years. The right to govern. At the same time, Yuwen Jinchen's three sons: Yuwenren, Yuwenyan, and Yuwenshi are all over ten years old. According to the Yuwen clan, the children and grandchildren over ten years old must have the ability to compete independently. The younger brother Yuwenshi of the twins accidentally missed his ten-year-old premiere, becoming the first descendant of Yuwen clan who failed the ten-year-old premiere in more than two hundred years. Yuwen Jinchen, who advocates the highest card art, chased Yuwenshi in anger Go out of the house and deprive him of the Yuwen surname. At this time, our protagonist, Qi Xiang, was unexpectedly involved in this magical world while seeking the truth about the CapitaLand incident and solving the mystery of environmental destruction, and got acquainted with Yuwenshi. The two formed a deep friendship. , In order to protect the environment and gain recognition, we jointly embarked on the road of Yujuka game... (translated from douban)

title: Tian Lang Zhan Ji
synopsis: The mysterious giant mech-"Sirius" descended from the sky, and three young men from Earth broke into the mecha by mistake. From this, they met the Sirians who controlled the "Sirius" and fought against evil alien forces with them. A tense, exciting, and thrilling battle is about to begin. Can the Sirians defeat the evil alien forces and return to Sirius with the help of the Earth boy? What kind of cool changes will the "Sirius" super energy grow after? Everything is in "Sirius". (translated from douban)

title: Hailuo Wan
synopsis: In a beautiful sea-Conch Bay, the human boy Ah Lei and his dolphin mother and his little friends live here. The growing Allee used his ingenuity to defeat the proud shark and win the championship of the underwater racing competition. Infiltrating the horns and trenches entrenched by the crab army, cleverly rescued the residents of Moonlight Canyon, and repelled the attack on Conch Bay by Locke and his crab army. The peaceful life of Conch Bay was still broken by the sudden intrusion of humans. Humans kept breaking into the waters of Conch Bay and clashing with the shark family. 　　 After A Lei rescued a little girl, A Lei, who fell into the water, human scientists discovered the trace of A Lei. People began to look for A Lei. Eventually, A Lei was captured by humans and brought back to the human world.()translated from douban

title: Zhonghua Dizi Gui
synopsis: Under the guidance of the traditional Chinese classic "Disciple Guidance", through the magical experience of the hero Tang Doudou in the fantasy world, the powerful force of traditional virtues is demonstrated, and the traditional moral behavior norms are spread through the learning and growth stories of Doudou and his classmates and parents. (translated from douban)

title: Abu Shui Qian Gushi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Jie Jie Xiong Yu Di Di Niao
synopsis: Jie Jie Xiong and Di Di Bird are good partners in the forest. Dada Wolf is a destroyer in the forest, but because of the protection of Jie Jie Xiong and Di Di Bird, its destruction is always unsuccessful.. .... (translated from douban)

title: Xiong Zi
synopsis: Giant panda with bright colors. Bear Tsai tried many methods, but his dream did not come true. Later, he slowly understood that life can become colorful even without a bright and colorful appearance. (translated from douban)

title: Xiong Zi Zhi Xiongxin Zhuangzhi
synopsis: This film is the second part of the "Bear Bear" series, which continues the style of the first part of "Bear Bear". It is an inspirational and humorous film with fairy tales. The protagonist bear has become more mature and stable after experiencing the first series of stories. Bear Tsai and his friends still live happily in the mysterious and beautiful gossip town, but their peaceful life is soon broken by an unexpected encounter. Suddenly one day, a plane accidentally crashed on the top of a cliff next to Bagua Town, and then a pair of siblings ran out of the plane embarrassedly. From then on, the quietness of the town was completely broken by the siblings. A lively and fierce homeland defense battle also started! (translated from douban)

title: Xiong Zi Zhi Xun Lu Zhan Ji
synopsis: The trash demon from the future appears and wants to destroy the earth. When the bear cub transformed into a panda hero and everyone fought against the big devil, the huge rock in the canyon burst and a gossip stone flew out. A big bird flew out of the gossip stone, and fought hard against the trash demon. The Trash Demon was injured and fled in a hurry. But the trash devil threatened everyone before he left, and he would come back to destroy the earth on the night of the full moon in the Mid-Autumn Festival... After the garbage demon escaped, Big Bird said that he was called Beitian, and he was one of the eight great beasts guarding the Eight Diagrams Stone. Bei Tian told Xiong Zai and others about the Eight Great Beasts and Bagua Stone. Xiong Zai and others found Grandpa Turtle with the gossip stone, and finally learned that only by finding other beasts to activate the gossip stone, can they resist the trash devil. The bear cub and others were ordered to embark on a difficult journey to find the beast. After being defeated by Bei Tian, ​​the garbage demon on the other side fled to a terrifying cave and threatened a cockroach (cockroach) and a mouse (rat Laibao) to be his own men. The Trash Demon asked his two men to go out to inquire about the news, while he hid in a cave to practice exercises, and waited until the night of the full moon to regain his vitality and destroy the earth again. When Cockroach Xixi and Shu Laibao inquired about Xiong Zai and others looking for mythical beasts, they continued to harass and destroy them. They wanted to snatch the gossip stone and seek credit from the trash king. Because of the appearance of Cockroach Xixi and Mouse Laibao, it was extremely difficult for the bear and others to find the beast. But Xiong Zai and others were not afraid of hardships, they still found all the beasts and reactivated the gossip stone. At this moment, it happened to be the night of the full moon, and the Garbage Demon also recovered and reappeared. So a fierce battle to defend the earth's environment began again... (translated from youku)

title: Xiong Zi Zhi Zhengyi Shouhu
synopsis: "Baide is a member of the "Bad Association" organization that advocates "doing bad things" and takes "bad" as the ethical standard. The organization has a clear hierarchy. The more bad things you do, the worse your position in the organization. Baide was originally a small leader of the organization, and he has been doing bad things to maintain his status. In a plan to do bad things, Baide accidentally made bad things into good deeds. Baide was offended because of good deeds. Because of the taboo of the "Bad Association", he was demoted to a low-level member by the Bad Boys Association. After being relegated to a low-level member, Baide was very unwilling. Baide had been planning to do some earth-shattering bad things and restore himself to the bad guys. Position in the federation. When Baide got the news that the Trash Demon was sealed by the bear with a gossip stone, he immediately had a new plan for bad things. Baide came to Bagua Town, extracted the cell genes of the Garbage Demon under the Bagua Stone, and planned to clone a Garbage Demon by using modern high-tech technology, and then manipulate the Garbage Demon to destroy the earth. Baide's guy was accidentally discovered by Xiong Zai and others. The bear cub led everyone to destroy Baide's cloning plan. "(translated from douban)

title: Xiong Zi Zhi Fei Xiong Buke
synopsis: "Bear Cubs: The Philippine Bear" is the third part of the "Bear Cubs" series. The theme of this section is positive and upward, and the main theme of the era-environmental protection! After the fierce struggle in the second part of 52 episodes, the bear finally recognized the true face of the rice bucket sister and brother. The two brothers and sisters also knew that there was no treasure in this place, and their treasure hunting plan was completely ruined. The Badass Association kept coming to collect debts. The brothers and sisters had nowhere to go. They begged Grandpa Turtle and others to live in Bagua Town, and in the end the kind-hearted everyone accepted them. Hope that this film can awaken the environmental awareness of all mankind. (translated from youku)

title: Shuxue Huang Dao Lixian Ji
synopsis: There is a magical wish code on the beautiful math island. As long as the numbers produced by "Kabu" and the symbols on "addition, subtraction, multiplication and division" are correctly filled in, any wish can be realized. In order to realize his ambition to dominate the world, the doctor wanted to get five Kabu. With the efforts of the mathematics genius Rock and his friends, the doctor's conspiracy was finally shattered. The doctor fell into the door of desire and went back to the past. After returning to the island of mathematics, the doctor pretended to be a prince of mathematics and continued his conspiracy even more frantically. Roque and his partners worked together to frustrate the conspiracy of the "Prince of Mathematics" again and again, and restore the peace of Mathematics Island. (translated from douban)

title: Shuxue Huang Dao Lixian Ji2
synopsis: season2 of it.

title: Shuxue Huang Dao Lixian Ji3
synopsis: The Adventures of a Deserted Island of Mathematics 3 is the third work in the mathematics series "The Adventures of a Deserted Island". It is an animated series that combines the theme of mathematics education and youth inspiration. The story continues the plot of the first and second part. It was told that the doctor had only been the "king of the world" for 3 minutes and was immediately beaten back to his original form. Once the code of desire is activated, you can control your own wishes. It tells everyone that if you want to get a real wish, you must answer the questions in the competition. Answering 1 math question correctly can realize a 3-minute wish, and answering 8 math questions correctly can realize a permanent wish. 　　 From this, the two sides of Doctor and Rock started a real contest. Can the king, Huahua, Yiyi, Xiaoqiang and other desert island partners adapt to the new life on earth? How will Rock and UBIQ meet new challenges and lift the desert island crisis? And the doctor also wooed a new helper, will the doctor's classic stupid conspiracy skills greatly increase? What will be the amazing performance of getting rid of the desire code of all parties? New crises, new challenges, new stories, a brand new mathematical contest is about to unfold.(translated from douban)

title: Huang Dao Lixian Ji Zhi Luo Ke He Biancheng Mao
synopsis: The story tells the story of the mathematics genius Rock and his friends who met a new friend, the programming cat. They used the knowledge of mathematics and programming to solve problems and helped the residents of the town together. With their help, intelligent technology changed the little More and more smart products appeared in the lives of the residents of the town, and life became more and more convenient. The town gradually became a world-renowned smart town.(translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 荒岛历险记之罗克和编程猫

title: Xiaochou Niu
synopsis: "The Clown Cow" is an original mobile web cartoon created by Wisdom Animation. The content is based on Olympic sports and modern fashion life. A funny and honest calf, his inner expectations and phenomena are always very different from the actual results. Even though the Mavericks were indomitable, they still failed repeatedly. Hey—attention, here I am—who am I? Don’t scare you, my name is—little—ugly—cow—cough! 　　The three-dimensional cartoon series "Clown Cow", it is nonsense and funny, facing each other When it comes to sports, it always seems omnipotent, but it often makes mistakes...(translated from douban)
